name_localized.it: Suite con una camera da letto

short_description_localized.en: The 56-square-metre/602-square-foot One-Bedroom Suites with king-size bed are designed to offer guests the luxury of the finest Italian hospitality in central New York.
short_description_localized.fr: Les suites à une chambre de 56 mètres carrés (602 pieds carrés) avec lit king-size sont conçues pour offrir aux clients le luxe de la meilleure hospitalité italienne du centre de New York.
short_description_localized.it: Le suite con una camera da letto di 56 metri quadrati / 602 piedi quadrati con letto king size sono progettate per offrire agli ospiti il ​​lusso della migliore ospitalità italiana nel centro di New York.

description_localized.en: Elegant, spacious and decorated in an unmistakable style, the 56-square-metre/602-square-foot One-Bedroom Suites are designed to offer guests the luxury of the finest Italian hospitality in central New York, whether on business or on holiday. Every suite features a marble foyer, a king-size bed and an ample bathroom with a generous tub. Max 2 guests.
description_localized.fr: Élégantes, spacieuses et décorées dans un style incomparable, les suites à une chambre de 56 mètres carrés sont conçues pour offrir aux clients le luxe de la plus belle hospitalité italienne du centre de New York, que ce soit pour les affaires ou les vacances. Chaque suite comprend un hall d'accueil en marbre, un lit king-size et une grande salle de bain avec une grande baignoire. Max 2 invités.
description_localized.it: Eleganti, spaziose e decorate in uno stile inconfondibile, le suite con una camera da letto di 56 metri quadrati / 602 piedi quadrati sono progettate per offrire agli ospiti il

images.name: One-Bedroom-Suite-King-
images.alt: This photo showcases our 600 square foot one bedroom suite, with a King size bed against the wall and a seating bench at the foot of the bed. Across from the bed is a custom made wooden wall unit, featuring six drawers, glass shelving with books, and a 43 inch flat screen TV. This elegant wall unit also features two sets of french doors leading into the living room. Next to the bed is a lounge chair with a standing lamp. Opposite the bed is the full size Italian marble bathroom with pocket doors. The living room features a seating area with a sofa, armchair, coffee and side table. The armoire in the living room is equipped with an additional 43 inch flat screen TV.
